name: Foosball
description:
--- The popular game of FOOSBALL is now available for FREE! ---

Pocket sized table football for your iPhone or iPad!

Pick up and play this easy-to-learn but hard-to-master iPhone game from Illusion Labs, the creators of smash-hits such as Touchgrind and Mr Crab.

Features
- One player against the iPhone
- Two players on the same device
- Intuitive and responsive controls
- True 3D physics
- Realistic sound effects
- Difficulty levels (Easy, Medium and Pro)
